Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

enumsResearchAssetType.description:
- RESEARCH_ASSET_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: The asset type has not been specified
 - RESEARCH_ASSET_TYPE_BOND: It's a Bond type of asset
 - RESEARCH_ASSET_TYPE_EQUITY: It's an Equity type of asset
enumsResearchAssetType.title: AssetType specifies the type of the asset (Bond, Equity, etc.)

securities.title: The securities to add to the watchlist
The securities to edit in the watchlist

v1FilterWatchlistsByUserRequest.title:
The request message for WatchlistAPI.FilterWatchlistsByUser.
(-- api-linter: core::0158::request-page-token-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we don't expect user will create a lot of watchlists and don't see this need --)
(-- api-linter: core::0158::request-page-size-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we don't expect user will create a lot of watchlists and don't see this need --)

ownerId.title:
Owner id
(-- api-linter: core::0124::required-reference=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we need this name to be consistent with the Watchlist proto definition --)

v1FilterWatchlistsByUserResponse.title:
The response message for WatchlistAPI.FilterWatchlistsByUser.
(-- api-linter: core::0158::response-next-page-token-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because irrelevant in this context... --)

watchlists.description: The entities that match the specified WatchlistsRequest.

securities.title: The securities to remove from the watchlist

id.title: The ID of the watchlist being changed

v1SearchWatchlistsRequest.title:
The request message for WatchlistAPI.SearchWatchlists.
(-- api-linter: core::0158::request-page-token-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because irrelevant in this context... --)

filterCriteria.title:
Criteria used to search Watchlists.
The supported syntax (for now): 
[target field]:[term] Eg: owner:"user"
[term] Eg: Technology (Matches anything containing Technology anywhere)
(-- api-linter: core::0132::request-unknown-fields=disabled
aip.dev/not-precedent: We really need this field because it is already implemented in prod --)

orderBy.title: Sorts the response with ascending or descending order based on specific field. Default as asc. e.g. "modified_time desc, owner"

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of watchlists to return. The service may
return fewer than this value. If unspecified, at most 10
note will be returned.

pageNumber.description:
When paginating, all other parameters provided to
'SearchWatchlists' must match the call that provided the page
number.
pageNumber.title: A page number

v1SearchWatchlistsResponse.title:
The response message for WatchlistAPI.SearchWatchlists.
(-- api-linter: core::0158::response-next-page-token-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because irrelevant in this context... --)

watchlists.description: The entities that match the specified WatchlistsRequest.

id.description:
Resources must have a 'id' field.

Id describes the computer or human assigned resource identifier.

ownerId.title: The user id who owns the watchlist

modifiedTime.title:
Time that watchlist was last modified
(-- api-linter: core::0142::time-field-names=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because desired field name ... --)

columnTags.title: List of column tags being watched

description.title:
Description of the watchlist
(-- api-linter: aladdin::0901::dictionary-message-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because description is specific to watchlist... --)
(-- api-linter: core::0124::required-reference=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because description is specific to watchlist... --)
